Coffee Muffins

Serves 6-12

Source of Recipe Silvana Franco Preparation Time 10 to 30 mins Cooking Time 10 to 30 mins

Makes 12 in regular patty tins or 6 in deep fill muffin tins (line each cavity with a circle of greaseproof paper). Silvana Franco

Ingredients
  • 300g / 10½oz plain flour
  • 2tsp baking powder
  • 150g / 5oz light brown sugar
  • 100g / 3½oz pecans, chopped roughly
  • 1 egg
  • 5ml / 1tsp vanilla extract
  • 225ml / 7½floz milk
  • 50g / 2oz butter, melted
  • 4tbsp strong black coffee
  • 2tbsp amber sugar crystals
Method

  1. Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Sift the flour and baking powder into a large bowl and stir in the sugar and pecan nuts.

  2. Crack the egg into a separate bowl and whisk in the vanilla, milk, melted butter and coffee.

  3. Stir the liquid into the dry ingredients taking care not to over mix. Spoon the mixture into the prepared tins.

  4. Scatter over the sugar crystals and bake for 15-20 minutes for 12 muffins or 20-25 for the larger six. They should be well risen and just firm to the touch.

Published: July 22 2012
